title: GTA+
headline: GTA+
subtitle: Super Yacht and Casino Penthouse Modifications
content:
GTA+ Members can claim 50% off all modifications for upper-crust investments like luxurious Super Yachts from DockTease and spacious Master Penthouses at The Diamond Casino & Resort.

GTA+ Membership automatically renews monthly, cancel any time. Visit rsg.ms/gtaplus for more info.
button: Select to sign up to GTA+
